title: Ep. 94: All Things FX Re-up With Nick Grad
description:
Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald are joined by FX president of original programming Nick Grad to discuss the success of 'Atlanta' (7:07), the development of that show’s second season (19:48), and the competition in today’s crowded TV landscape (35:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
